name: LumishoreCommandCenter
0:
”Alexa, ask Command Center to turn All Zones on”
”Alexa, ask Command Center to set All Zones to warm white”
”Alexa, ask Command Center to set All Zones to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: command center
des:
Control your Lumishore lights with voice commands.

You can turn Zones & Scenes on & off, and also control Zone color & brightness.
